item.title: Event Loop in Go
item.description: “Single Threaded Even Loop” or simply “Event Loop” is a fairly well-known concept in the programming world. This concept was popularized early on by GUI frameworks and JavaScript engines running in browsers and later by Node.js as well. The important advantage of this construct is we can stop worrying about “thread safety” altogether. Thread safety comes for free because all you have is only one thread anyway. What is an “Event Loop”?

item.title: Network Address Translation
